basics.summary: MSc candidate in Computational Science & Engineering at McMaster University with expertise in geometric deep learning and computational finance. Faculty Affiliate Researcher at Vector Institute focusing on Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning and hypernetworks for stochastic processes.

Developed novel meta-learning approaches for parameter-efficient fine-tuning

Advanced research in geometric deep learning and foundation models

work.name: McMaster University
work.summary: Conducting research on novel deep learning architectures, particularly hypernetworks for financial time series modeling. Optimizing foundation models through parameter-efficient fine-tuning techniques for enhanced computational efficiency and effectiveness. Utilizing advanced mathematical properties of underlying models and data functions for breakthrough innovations.
highlights: Thesis: Geometric Deep Learning (Hypernetworks) for Time-Series Data
Research focus: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT) of Large Language Models
Supervisor: Prof. Anastasis Kratsios
Maintained 3.9/4.0 GPA with full scholarship
